title: I Became the Ultimate Boss - Novel Updates
tags: Alternate World   Carefree Protagonist   Dreams   Evil Gods   Evil Religions   Eye Powers   Fanaticism   Game Elements   Godly Powers   Loyal Subordinates   Magic Formations   Monsters   Multiple Identities   Mutated Creatures   Parallel Worlds   Pets   Protagonist Strong from the Start   Sealed Power   Special Abilities   Summoning Magic   Transported into a Game World

description:
Every time he goes to sleep, he will enter a game's Ultimate Boss' body. 

He's the Sleeper of R'lyeh at the bottom of the ocean, the Great Old One in the game, the master of the dream that makes one fall into madnessâ€”Cthulhu! 

Due to the rising of the game, more and more fanatics call upon His name. There will be a strange item at home every time Ke Meng wakes up. It's quite a trouble for an unboxing video creator like him...>
